snippet.title: Rough Justice '84 | Coming to Consoles on December 20th!
snippet.description:
Do what it takes to make your fledgling security agency thrive in this 80s noir crime bustin', dirty crossing, vengeance-seeking board game inspired strategy game with dice and cards.

In this single-player board game-inspired strategy game, solve puzzles and use dice and cards to successfully run your private security agency. Advise your agents as they deal with security, fugitive recovery, repossession cases, and more.

Developed by Gamma Minus
https://rough-justice.com/
https://www.facebook.com/gaming/RoughJustice84/
https://twitter.com/RoughJustice84
https://www.instagram.com/roughjustice84/
